text: Updating the Semantics of Bims as variables now can be assigned both integers and truth values, we need to change the definition of program states. Let V= Z U {tt, ff) be the set of admissible values Definition (state) A state is a partial function s: Var = V. The set of all states is denoted by States = Var = V For s € States, x € Var, and v € V, the state update s[x > v] is defined as expected
